rComments: Prof. Kotowski is really interesting and incredibly well educated. He keeps students interested and always accepts questions or discussion topics even though it was a fairly large class. Lots of extra credit opportunities and the quizzes are straight cut. Dresses really well but takes forever to grade, really organized and uses blackboard well.

Kotowski is probably the best teacher I've ever had here. As this is a political class, it's very easy for someone, including a teacher, to get wrapped up in their own opinion. He doesn't do this. He shows both sides of the coin consistently and he will always take feedback from students.

I took Professor Kotowski's European Politics class which was pretty good. His lectures are very wordy and his slides are very jam packed with information. Good thing is that he posts his powerpoints online. Down side is that he is a tough grader, especially on the research essays he assigned. Overall he is very knowledgeable.

Lectures can be very boring and dry, but Kotowski is quite the looker! His lectures/slides are very clear. Definitely keep up with the reading and don't wait until the last minute to do them! He's a great professor and looks beyond gorgeous. I recommend going to his office hours he is very nice and helpful!

This class could get boring at times due to the dry lectures, but Kotowski is a great professor! He's a very good looking man so going to class wasn't too bad. Study off the slides for the final and definitely keep up with the reading. It's a lot and very useful for essays!

Lectures started off dry and boring but that's because he's explaining dry and boring theories. Once we started in on practical application the class totally picked up. Do the readings and go talk to him in office hours, Jan is beyond helpful (even with other classes!)
He is truly a beautiful, wonderful man. Truly insipiring, and not too hard on the eyes. So intelligent and thoughtful. Best Professor i've had yet.

Professor Kotowski has been one of the best professors I've had. He is very knowledgable. His lectures are crystal clear. I am very happy to have taken this class with Kotowski. He does assign a lot of text. However, he's great. Highly recommend.

Professor Kotowski is a very good and clear lecturer, but the notes are quite extensive. Attencence in lecture isn't necessary as long as you keep up with the heavy reading load and review his powerpoint slides online. However, attending section is necessary and reading for section is necessary.

He is an awesome professor. Knows his subject very well and is engaging during lecture. He does the perfect amount of student interaction and lecture. At first the class may seem boring but it gets much better as the quarter goes on. Definitely a good experience.
Jan Kotowski is a magnificent professor who is beyond gorgeous and he makes every class worth going to. He is brilliant, and talking to him one on one will blow your mind. Beautiful, brilliant man.
